body_html:
Thanks, it probably is a regression.

As a workaround, if you don't actually need CUDA support (you'd need a fairly unconventional OS X build to actually make use of it), you can build with NO_CUDA=1
body_text:
Thanks, it probably is a regression.
As a workaround, if you don't actually need CUDA support (you'd need a fairly unconventional OS X build to actually make use of it), you can build with NO_CUDA=1
body:
Thanks, it probably is a regression.

As a workaround, if you don't actually need CUDA support (you'd need a fairly unconventional OS X build to actually make use of it), you can build with NO_CUDA=1
